properties.areaDesc: Monroe, IN; Greene, IN; Owen, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 10:25AM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a Flood
Warning for portions of the following waterways in central and
southern Indiana...

Big Blue River...East Fork White River...Flatrock River...
...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has upgraded the
flood category from Minor to Moderate severity for the following
rivers and streams in Illinois...Indiana...

White River at Hazleton

...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has upgraded the
flood category from Minor to Moderate severity for the following
rivers and streams

Driftwood River near Edinburgh 2 SW
East Fork White River at Seymour
White River near Centerton
White River below Eagle Valley Power Plant
White River at Spencer
White River at Elliston
White River at Edwardsport
White River at Petersburg


.With rainfall totals between 1 to 2 inches there are
widespread flooding concerns across much of Indiana. Over the next
couple of days we will see another 1 to 3 inches of rain or more
possible.

The Flood Warning continues for
The White River at Spencer.
* from Saturday morning until further notice.
* At  9:30 AM Friday the stage was 6.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Saturday morning and continue
to rise to near 21.8 feet by Tuesday morning.
* At 22.0 feet...Some evacuations may begin in Prospect Park area and
western outskirts of Spencer.  Recreational area on southwest side
of Spencer is flooded.  Flood waters affect the southern part of
Freedom while rural area just north of Freedom extensively floods.
Several local roads along the White River in southern Owen County
are flooded extensively.

NWSheadline: Forecast flooding increased from Minor to Moderate severity
